original_text: When Esther's young women and her eunuchs came and told her, the queen was deeply distressed. She sent garments to clothe Mordecai, so that he might take off his sackcloth, but he would not accept them.
korean_text: 에스더의 시녀와 내시가 나아와 전하니 왕후가 매우 근심하여 입을 의복을 모르드개에게 보내어 그 굵은 베 옷을 벗기고자 하나 모르드개가 받지 아니하는지라

sentences.original_text: When Esther's young women and her eunuchs came and told her
sentences.korean_translation: 에스더의 시녀들과 내시가 와서 그녀에게 알렸을 때

sentences.original_text: She sent garments to clothe Mordecai
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 모르드개에게 옷을 보내어 입히려고 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: so that he might take off his sackcloth
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자기의 굵은 베옷을 벗게 하려는 것이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: but he would not accept them.
